promptPrefix:
I want you to only response in [TARGETLANGUAGE].
I want you to act as a SEO text writer that speaks and writes fluent [TARGETLANGUAGE]. I want you to generate meta title and meta description for the following blog post titles it should convince the reader to buy the products also try to not spread false information by not mentioning specific details about the product try to also add a Call to action: [PROMPT]. Title 70-80 characters and insert the keyword at the beginning, description with maximum 160 characters. Please create a table with two columns title and description and enter your result there.
title: Meta Title/Description Writer for Products
